Executes the upgrade.

Upgrade - Class in gameobjects.towers
An abstract class for defining an upgrade to a tower, a buyable object with a cost that, when bought, changes a tower in certain way (usually its projectiledata or other related things).
Upgrade(Tower, BuyInfo) - Constructor for class gameobjects.towers.Upgrade
 
upgradePanel - Variable in class gameobjects.ui.Shop
 
UpgradePanel - Class in gameobjects.ui
A panel to provide purchaseable upgrades for the selected tower.

upgradePath - Variable in class gameobjects.towers.Tower
 
UpgradePath - Class in gameobjects.towers
A class for defining the path that a tower progresses when applying multiple upgrades to itself.
UpgradePath(Upgrade[][]) - Constructor for class gameobjects.towers.UpgradePath
Initializes the upgrade path with a 2D array of upgrades, with each array representing a branch and each subarray representing the contents of that branch.
UpgradePath.State - Enum in gameobjects.towers
The state of a branch/upgrade.
upgrades - Variable in class gameobjects.towers.UpgradePath
